channel.title: When i drop item it doesnt appear on the ground?
channel.description: Can someone tell me how i can fix this when i drop anything any item it doesnt appear on the ground it goes away and same with npcs it doesnt show on the ground its annoying and i need help fixing it.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 08:34:44 PM[/size][hr]someone help? [br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 08:57:47 PM[/size][hr]fixed
